subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which city was the capital of Rajasthan before Jaipur?
question_hi: राजस्थान की पहली राजधानी किस संस्करण में थी।
explanation_en: Before becoming the capital of Rajasthan, Udaipur was the capital of Mewar state.
explanation_hi: मेवार राज्य के राजधानी में, Udaipur थी।
